enchantment.embellishedenchanting.thunde: 弓箭击中目标实体时会生成闪电
enchantment.embellishedenchanting.stun.d: 攻击将使目标眩晕一会儿
enchantment.embellishedenchanting.annihi: 攻击时有极低的概率直接秒杀目标
enchantment.embellishedenchanting.hex.de: 对目标造成伤害的同时给予一定的百分比魔法伤害
enchantment.embellishedenchanting.immort: 工具在用尽耐久时会重生在末影箱中
enchantment.embellishedenchanting.deflag: 工具在耐久用尽时会产生爆炸
enchantment.embellishedenchanting.blurse: 攻击时有概率能够造成更大的伤害，但同时耐久消耗也会增加
enchantment.embellishedenchanting.shockw: 射出的箭矢会造成小范围的AOE伤害
enchantment.embellishedenchanting.grappl: 射出的箭矢会把目标拉向你
enchantment.embellishedenchanting.voidin: 破坏地形方块时将不会产生掉落物
